summary: highly detalized dark scheme for gui and 256 color terminal
name: lettuce.vim
description:
Detalized and nice-looking color scheme with dark background.
Can be used in gui and 256 color terminal.
Highlights statusline in insert mode.
Improved highlighting for c, cpp, ruby and javascript languages.

Also following option is recommended (put it to your .vimrc):
set fillchars=vert:\ ,fold:\ " <- trailing space

versions.release_notes: Improved highlighting for c, cpp, ruby and javascript
